name: Aphelion Episode Two: Wings of Omega
name_original: Aphelion Episode Two: Wings of Omega
description: Aphelion Episode 2 Wings of Omega features 5 playable character, tons of skills, quests, fast-paced dungeons, NewGame+ and a lot more! The 6+ hour story continues and Savion must contend with enemies on two fronts as you unravel who the true orchestrator is of the attack on Earth!
